name: Blaster_Ranged.Psychic_Blast
display_help: Blast villains with an array of offensive, long range Psionic powers. While few living beings can resist their effects, Creatures without minds, like machines and robots, are not affected as strongly.

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Psychic_Blast.Psionic_Dart
powers.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed, but has a very fast attack rate. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: -30.00% strength to recharge for 6s on target
6.60% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.5s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Psychic_Blast.Mental_Blast

display_info: -30.00% strength to recharge for 6s on target

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Psychic_Blast.Telekinetic_Blast
powers.display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 60.00% chance for 6.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Psychic_Blast.Aim
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

display_info: 62.50% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Psychic_Blast.Will_Domination
powers.display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 80.00% chance for 3.0 sleep for 19.07s on target after 0.25s delay

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Psychic_Blast.Psionic_Lance
powers.display_help: This extremely long range Psionic attack has a bonus to Accuracy, and can Slow a target's attack rate. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Psychic_Blast.Psionic_Tornado
powers.display_help: Unleashes a whirlwind of Psionic energy on a target, tossing nearby foes into the air. The Psionic Tornado damages foes and Slows their attack speed. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DoT(Psionic), Foe Knockback
